headline: IGY Marinas Appointed Marina Operator at Wynn Al Marjan Island Marina
summary: OLDSMAR, Fla., August 18, 2025--MarineMax, Inc. (NYSE: HZO), the world’s largest recreational boat and yacht retailer, marina operator and superyacht services company, today announced that IGY Marinas ("IGY") has been appointed as the marina operator for Wynn Al Marjan Island Marina in Ras Al Khaimah, United Arab Emirates. This marks the second IGY Marina destination in the Middle East and underscores the company's commitment to expanding its luxury marina network to key destinations globally.
